freshnessLogScale(): expression: (log($maxAge + scale) - log(docAge + scale)) / (log($maxAge + scale) - log(scale))
wilsonScoreWithPriorNRT(): expression: if (dotProduct(property_gmps, wilson_score_with_prior_key) == 0, query(defaultNewPropertyGmpScore), dotProduct(property_gmps, wilson_score_with_prior_key)/10000)
wilsonScoreVespa(): expression: if (wilsonScoreViews == 0, 0, (phat + pow(query(z), 2) / (2 * wilsonScoreViews) - query(z) * sqrt( (phat * (1-phat) +  pow(query(z), 2)/ (4 * wilsonScoreViews)) / wilsonScoreViews) ) / (1 +  pow(query(z), 2)/wilsonScoreViews))

first-phase: expression: 1.0 / (1.0 + exp($model_bias - (popularityScore + declaredProfileScore + inferredProfileScore + trendingScore + ageDecayScore * $ageDecayScoreCoefficient)))
expression: 1.0 / (1.0 + exp($model_bias - (popularityScore + declaredProfileScore + inferredProfileScore + trendingScore + ageDecayScore * $ageDecayScoreCoefficient)))

gmpWithPrior(): expression: if (query(defaultGmpScore) == 0, propertyGmp, if (propertyGmp == 0, query(defaultGmpScore), propertyGmp))
wilsonRankingScore(): expression: wilsonScoreNRT * $wilsonScoreNRTCoefficient + wilsonScoreVespa * $wilsonScoreVespaCoefficient + wilsonScoreDecayedVespa * $wilsonScoreDecayedVespaCoefficient + viewThresholdBasedWilsonScoreNRT * $viewThresholdBasedWilsonScoreNRTCoefficient + wilsonScoreZ10 * $wilsonScoreZ10Coefficient
linearRankingScore(): expression: gmpScore * $gmpScoreCoefficient + gmpWithPrior * $propertyGmpCoefficient + userFavoritesScore * $userFavoritesScoreCoefficient + ageDecayScore * $ageDecayScoreCoefficient + inferredScore * $inferredScoreCoefficient + inferredWikiScore * $inferredWikiScoreCoefficient + inferredYctScore * $inferredYctScoreCoefficient + propertyTrendingScores * $trendingScoreCofficient + rocchioWikiInferredScore * $rocchioWikiInferredCofficient + wilsonRankingScore

logisticRegressionScore(): expression: 1.0 / (1.0 + exp(1.4030464 - propertyGmp * 38.46097 - propertyGmp * dwelltimeScore * 1.4677398 - inferredWikiScore * 0.02095053 - inferredYctScore * 0.04352445))

linearRankingScore(): expression: gmpScore * $gmpScoreCoefficient + gmpWithPrior * $propertyGmpCoefficient + videoUserFavoritesScore * $userFavoritesScoreCoefficient + ageDecayScore * $ageDecayScoreCoefficient + inferredVideoScore * $inferredScoreCoefficient + inferredVideoWikiScore * $inferredWikiScoreCoefficient + inferredVideoYctScore * $inferredYctScoreCoefficient + propertyTrendingScores * $trendingScoreCofficient + rocchioWikiInferredScore * $rocchioWikiInferredCofficient + wilsonRankingScore
